description: Learn how to make beef stew from scratch. This one-pot meal with winter veg and macaroni is the perfect dinner to warm you up.
keywords: Beef stew,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Comfort food,Slow cooker,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Slow-Cooked Beef Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g chuck steak, cut into 3cm cubes, trimmed of visible fat
800g diced Italian tomatoes no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to a large saucepan over high heat. Add beef, and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until browned all over.
Reduce heat to medium and add garlic, celery and rosemary and saut√© for 1-2 minutes.

Add tomato paste and stir to combine. Transfer to a slow cooker, add tomatoes and 4 cups water and cook on low heat for 6 hours, or until beef is tender. In the last hour of cooking, add the winter veg mix.
Mix in cooked pasta, season with pepper to taste, garnish with parsley and serve.
